content: > **if you love this design please help us by adding it to your ravelry favorites and sharing it on your favorite social media facebook instagram twitter pinterest etc thank you ** > > ** 10% off all yarn at knitomatic com use discount code rav17 at check out 1 ** > one use per person we reserve the right to cancel offer at any time 1 https //knitomatic myshopify com/ the pattern is very simple fast and satisfying for time when you just need to produce something fast it is knit in the round using a really long circular needle and a nifty little cast on just for mobius knitting to learn this easy new skill you can watch cat bohrdi s great intro to mobius knitting 1 tutorial on you tube cat s instructions are clear and easy to follow and you ll be an expert in no time **size** s/m m/l tighter looser 6 5 high unstretched approx 13 14 inches long at bottom lying flat **materials** 1 skeins malabrigo rasta 150g-82m colour 853 abril 10mm/36 circular needles 1 stitch marker **gauge** 8 sts & 21 row = 4 /10cm in k3 row p3 row rib **techniques** intro to mobius knitting 2 tutorial by cat bohrdi on you tube http //www youtube com/watch v=lvntda7f2v4 1 http //www youtube com/watch v=lvntda7f2v4 2 http //www youtube com/watch v=lvntda7f2v4
